column3: Only user stories with acceptable status are eligible
Exclude tasks whose status indicates blocking
Only workers with sufficient availability can be assigned
Prefer sprints with higher goal achievement status
Include only blockers below a severity threshold when counting risk
Backlog must be in an allowed operational status
Sprint must be in a plannable/executable status
Only snapshots meeting minimum test status are valid
Prefer items aligned to higher-influence stakeholders
Sprint backlog must be in a consistent status before commit
Exclude disallowed task types from planning
